item.title: Covad Offers A Nationwide MPLS VPN Network For Business
item.description:
Companies with numerous offices across the country have access to a new secure networking solution. Covad’s recently launched Intelligent Network Platform offers expanded WAN networking capabilities at a lower cost than traditional options. Covad’s MPLS VPNs are designed for small to medium-sized businesses and larger dispersed companies needing to connect multiple locations, such as franchises, remote offices, warehouses, retail stores, factories, and hotels. Multi-location networking presents two key challenges: establishing secure and reliable connections between all sites and doing so cost-effectively...
